thread.section_title: Lencred Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lencred | www.lencred.com
thread.title: Tammie Mickle

author: Tammie Mickle
title: Tammie Mickle
text:
I have not had the opportunity of getting funding as of yet but he is a very pleasant guy and is always willing to help. He has a good ear to listen so he will know exactly how to help you. I am sure I will be getting funded soon but I did want to take the time and express how pleasant he is to work with. I told my assistant that we need more people in the lending business like Joel. They come a far and a few.
God Bless you Joel you are a Gem!!!
